69CRC-S2820.Bulletin Desc:
NOTICE:
"Vendors are to bid the transformer based on a rating of 15/20/25 MVA, 65 degree-Rise"

This specification is for two (2) 60 Hz 3-phase, 2-winding transformers. The top rating of both transformers T1 & T2 is 25 MVA at 65 degrees C rise over the ambient temperature described in "Service Conditions". Capacity and cooling as specified. Voltage is 69D-12.47GY/7.2kV. See Delivery and Technical Specifications.
